'''Acorns''' are a quest item required to complete the quest [[Helping Irenicus's captive dryads]]. This item can only be acquired during the first chapter of [[Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn]] while the quest cannot be completed until later in the game.

==Location==
*The acorns can be acquired after killing the [[duergar]] [[Ilyich]] in [[Irenicus' Dungeon]].

==Description==
{{quote|These are the dryads' magical acorns that you've obtained off of the duergar leader, Ilyich.}}
